entries.text:
A green-rusted ornament of young grass, the crest of Princess Filianore.
Restores 3 HP every second whilst worn.
Enables the collection of Filianore's Spear Ornament from enemies.
The Spears of the Church watch over the Princess' slumber, and when the church is compromised by a trespasser, the Judicator summons them as loyal spirits to eliminate the threat.
Loyal spirits summoned as Spears of the Church are granted a blessing of protection.
